examples.example: 我今天买了两公斤新鲜的水果，准备和家人一起分享。

translate.english: I bought two kilograms of fresh fruits today and am going to share them with my family.

examples.example: 他轻松地提起那十公斤重的哑铃，展现出惊人的力量。

translate.english: He easily lifted the ten-kilogram dumbbell, showing amazing strength.

examples.example: 我成功地减掉了五公斤，整个人都变得更加精神了。

translate.english: I successfully lost five kilograms and the whole person has become more energetic.
